text:
Even though there’s so much information on fitness/diet, there isn’t a one-stop shop. 

People still don’t know where to start, and each scenario varies. 

Backed by real science, and real data, and real technology, that gap can be filled. 

Cc @_buildspace / @_nightsweekends https://t.co/HHgwT0fADJ

user_info.name: Mohammad Khan
user_info.description: 🌞 the mind is a beautiful place, it can be. 💡 tech, fitness & mental health advocate. 🧘🏽‍♂️ co-founder (ig: mebame)
